name: Dream Dr
description:
A short adventure game made for minijam 105: dreamy! with the restriction of "each play-though is unique"  
I had the idea to make each "playthrough" very short, breaking up a normal adventure game puzzle into micro loops about acquiring information.

Play as Dr. Ream, a 22nd century psychologist treating a patient at the local hospital, who's in a bad state of regret, playing the same memory over and over again. explore around the dream and find the clue to break the cycle.

Arrow keys to move around, Z to interact
(WASD and left mouse work as well)
((and also controller? for some reason?)
